summary: Hyenas are a small family of four unique meat-eating mammals found in Africa. Though they look and act like dogs, they're actually more closely related to cats. Hyenas are important in their ecosystems, but in many stories and beliefs, they're seen as scary and bad. People think they can steal things, influence spirits, and are even used in some traditional medicines. Despite these beliefs, hyenas are fascinating creatures with special roles in nature.
title: Hyena
